textAfterTable: MicroData Summary for Franz Xaver von Salm-Reifferscheidt-Krautheim: Franz Xaver Cardinal von Salm-Reifferscheidt-Krautheim (born 1 Feb 1749, died 19 Apr 1822) Bishop of Gurk Consistory - September 1816: Created Cardinal a priest for 46.6 years a bishop for 37.6 years a cardinal for 5.5 years Ordained Priest by: Pope Pius VI (Giovanni Angelico Braschi †) Principal Consecrator: Archbishop Jérôme Joseph Franz de Paula Colloredo von Wallsee und Mels † Archbishop of Salzburg Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Archbishop Jérôme Joseph Franz de Paula Colloredo von Wallsee und Mels † (1762) Archbishop of Salzburg Archbishop Siegmund Christoph von Schrattenbach † (1753) Archbishop of Salzburg Bishop Josef Maria von Thun und Hohenstein † (1742) Bishop of Gurk Pope Benedict XIV (1724) (Prospero Lorenzo Lambertini †) Pope Benedict XIII (1675) (Pietro Francesco (Vincenzo Maria) Orsini de Gravina, O.P. †) Paluzzo Cardinal Paluzzi Altieri Degli Albertoni † (1666) Chamberlain (Camerlengo) of the Apostolic Chamber Ulderico Cardinal Carpegna † (1630) Cardinal-Priest of Santa Maria in Trastevere Luigi Cardinal Caetani † (1622) Cardinal-Priest
